ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Charm Kiting...
ygData.msgSnippet: Heard at one point it was supposed to be that way.  Never tested it actually believe it or not.  Something tells me it s not set up that way as it would make
ygData.messageBody:
Heard at one point it was supposed to be that way. Never tested it
actually believe it or not. Something tells me it's not set up that way as
it would make us even MORE overpowered LOL.

Raub

At 06:28 PM 02/06/2003 -0800, you wrote:
>If a bard charms, can he simply keep the song targetted on the mob and never
>have to worry about it "wearing off" the way chanters (and necros, druids,
>shamen, et cetera) do?
>
>=====
>There are things in the Constitution that have been overtaken by events,
>by time...Inappropriate, anachronistic, it isn't done anymore...
>-- Chairman Henry Hyde, who doesn't believe the Constitution needs to be
>followed or legally changed, just ignored.
